tidbits.title: Galapagos Islands
tidbits.description: Ecuador is home to the legendary Galapagos Islands, renowned for their unique wildlife and Charles Darwin's observations that contributed to the theory of evolution.

tidbits.title: Geographical Diversity
tidbits.description: The country showcases remarkable geographical diversity, encompassing the Andes Mountains, the Amazon Rainforest, and the Pacific Coast.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: Ecuador celebrates a rich cultural heritage, with indigenous influences, colorful markets, traditional music like Andean folk, and a deep-rooted connection to nature.
